title: Two Storey House for Sale in Ulapane, Kandy District.
details: Two Storied House for Sale in Ulapane, Kandy District, built on 15 Perches Land and also reservation also available and it can be used. Just 3 Km to Ulapane Junction,10 Km to Gampola & Nawalapitiya town. Bordering to both Kandy and Nuwara Eliya Districts.
